title: SoO meet in Radley Oxfordshire tonight

posts.content:
For the regulars: The meet is on tonight.
I am hoping numbers are going up again because of better weather

For whoever is interested in turning up:
The venue is the Bowyer Arms in Radley.
Time is usually from about 8pm.
This meet is held every 2nd Tuesday of the Month so if you can't make it there is always another chance a month later.
Please contact me if you are planning to come as sometimes we combine this with the classic car meet in Warborough about 10 miles from Radley (not tonight though).

Hope to see you there.
Cheers,
Gertjan
